sentences.en: A single - celled microorganism, especially a flagellate protozoan of the genus Monas.
sentences.cn: 单胞体 单细胞 的微生物, 尤指单''.'胞'. ''虫类的有鞭毛的原生动物.

sentences.en: Blastocystis hominis is a unicellular protozoan commonly found in the intestinal tract of human and mammal.
sentences.cn: 人芽囊原虫是一种常见的人和哺乳动物肠道寄生原虫.

sentences.en: Blastocystis hominis is an intestinal protozoan parasite restricted to humans and primates.
sentences.cn: 人芽囊原虫(Blastocystishominis, B. h)是一种存在于人类和其他灵长类动物体内的肠道寄生原虫.

sentences.en: Conclusion The source water diverted from Luan River was polluted by protozoan and viruses.
sentences.cn: 结论引滦水源已受原虫和病毒的污染.

sentences.en: Cryptosporidium and Giardia axe two common species of pathogenic protozoan, seriously endangering the water quality.
sentences.cn: 隐孢子虫和贾第鞭毛虫是两种严重危害水质安全的病原性原生动物.

sentences.en: Giardia lamblia is one of the most important parasitic protozoan threatening human health globally.
sentences.cn: 蓝氏贾第鞭毛虫是全球危害人类健康的重要寄生性原虫之一.

sentences.en: Plasmodium is a protozoan which causes malaria; it is the causative agent of the disease.
sentences.cn: 疟原虫是引起疟疾的原生动物; 是疾病的病原体.

sentences.en: Protozoan diversity of the ecosystem stability of the status quo stated.
sentences.cn: 原生动物多样性现状阐明各生态系的稳定性.

sentences.en: T . gondii is a protozoan organism that can infect all mammals, who serve as intermediate hosts.
sentences.cn: 弓形虫是一种原生动物,可以传染给所有的哺乳动物作为中间宿主.

sentences.en: Toxoplasma gondii is a protozoan parasite that can infect aves 、 mammal and human beings.
sentences.cn: 弓形虫是一种全球性分布的寄生原虫,可感染鸟类、哺乳动物和人.

trans.tran_en: a very small living thing that has only one cell
